title: WordPress isn‚Äôt just software
content:
Did you know‚Ä¶ ü§ì

‚Ä¶there are huge WordPress events worldwide where thousands of enthusiasts meet, connect, and learn from each other?

Besides local meetups, there are international conferences like WordCamp Europe, WordCamp US, and WordCamp Asia. People from all corners of the WordPress world‚Äîdevelopers, designers, agencies, and businesses‚Äîcome together to share ideas, best practices, and real-world experience.

In short: WordPress isn‚Äôt just software. It‚Äôs a global community you can actually meet in person.

title: WordPress 6.9 ‚ÄúGene‚Äù
content:
WordPress 6.9 is here!

Major upgrades for team collaboration and content creation.

  • Notes feature: Introduces block-level commenting to streamline reviewing and polishing content.
  • Command Palette: Now faster for power users.
  • Abilities API: Provides a standardized way to open the door for AI-powered and automated workflows.
